Manahi Sword returned to Rotorua iwi and presented to new Defence Force chief https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/manahi-sword-returned-to-rotorua-iwi-and-presented-to-new-defence-force-chief/QJX3ZBUGWZCOFJT4PMX5KQEHGU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/manahi-sword-returned-to-rotorua-iwi-and-presented-to-new-defence-force-chief/QJX3ZBUGWZCOFJT4PMX5KQEHGU/ Special ceremony marks changes at top of New Zealand Defence Force.
